Articles.Content:
I installed the tourism contract pack and loaded my first tourist, Tito Kerman, onto a rocket. I scammed him by merely tagging him onto a rescue mission.

So, the rocket has two pods, one passenger on launch. The pilot is a probe core.

I also use Kerbal Construction Time - when I launched it asked if I'd like to load tourists. I said yes. Launch was good, and Tito rendezvoused with the stranded kerbal.

Richly grabbed the pod, and tried to board, but BOTH pods contain Tito Kerman!! I think KCT loaded the same tourist that was already loaded.

I've tried editing the persistent.sfs but the game breaks if you just delete the passenger's name from a pod.

Any advice please? I don't have any other suitable saves to revert to.

Edited May 22, 2015 by Matt77

Sorry, sorted it.

You have to delete the entire line, including "crew = ".

If you leave it blank, the game crashes. Crew = 0 puts Jeb in the chair.
